parameters.name: FromExecTime
parameters.description: The minimum execution duration of a task. This parameter is used to filter tasks whose execution duration is longer than the minimum execution duration. Unit: seconds. The default value is 0, which indicates that no limit is imposed.

parameters.name: FromStartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The start time can be up to 30 days earlier than the current time.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that you can specify an unlimited number of instance IDs. Separate multiple instance IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 30 instance IDs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 10 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~473763~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The task status. Valid values:

*   **Scheduled**
*   **Running**
*   **Succeed**
*   **Failed**
*   **Cancelling**
*   **Canceled**
*   **Waiting**

>  This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that tasks in all states are queried. Separate multiple states with commas (,).

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The task ID. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that you can specify an unlimited number of task IDs. Separate multiple task IDs with commas (,). You can specify up to 30 task IDs.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description:
The task type. This parameter is empty by default, which indicates that you can specify an unlimited number of task types.

*   **ModifyInsSpec**
*   **DeleteInsNode**
*   **AddInsNode**
*   **HaSwitch**
*   **RestartIns**
*   **CreateIns**
*   **ModifyInsConfig**

>  Separate multiple task types with commas (,).

parameters.name: ToExecTime
parameters.description: The maximum execution duration of a task. This parameter is used to filter tasks whose execution duration is shorter than or equal to the maximum execution duration. Unit: seconds. The default value is 0, which indicates that no limit is imposed.

parameters.name: ToStartTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Only tasks that have a start time earlier than or equal to the time specified by this parameter are queried.
